# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="067a1-102">Odgovaranje u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="067a1-103">Da biste odgovorili na jednu poruku u jednom trenutku:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-104">Na listi poruka odaberite poruku na koju želite da odgovorite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-105">U gornjem desnom uglu okna sa porukama izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="067a1-106">**Odgovorite** ili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="067a1-107">**Odgovori svima**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-108">Upišite svoju poruku, a zatim kliknite na dugme " **Pošalji**".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="067a1-109">Da biste automatski odgovorili na sve poruke:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-110">pođi do</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="067a1-111">**Postavke** > **Prikaz svih postavki programa Outlook** > **Mail** > **automatski odgovori** na otvaranje [postavki automatskog odgovora](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-112">Izaberite preklopno dugme **Uključi automatske odgovore**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-113">Biranje **slanja odgovora samo tokom vremenskog perioda** polje za potvrdu omogućava:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="067a1-114">Samo šaljite odgovore kada odaberete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="067a1-115">Ako ne postavite vremenski period, automatski odgovor ostaje uključen dok ga ne isključite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="067a1-116">Blokiranje kalendara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="067a1-117">Automatski odbij nove pozivnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="067a1-118">Odbij i otkaži moje sastanke tokom tog perioda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-119">U okviru za poruke otkucajte poruku koju želite da pošaljete ljudima tokom vremena na koje ste se udaljili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-120">Da biste poslali odgovore samo na kontakte, potvrdite izbor u polju za potvrdu **Pošalji odgovore samo na kontakte** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="067a1-121">Kliknite na dugme **Sačuvaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="067a1-122">Saznajte više o [automatskom prosleđivanju u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="067a1-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
